channel.title: Strange Problem
channel.description: Alright well each time I try to download an eclipse rsps server+client it acts all werid. This all started happening when I un-installed my jre7 because it wouldnt allow me to play other peoples server so now i have jre6 and jdk7. For some reason each time i run the client for any eclipse server and client the server starts flashing and moving around my computer screen and i have to open task manager to close it. And then the client does the same but only shows up 3 times and disapears. So I was thinking if i un-installed jdk7 and got jdk6 will it let me play it then? Because before i had jdk7 and jre7 and it worked fine. Thanks to anyone who can help!

item.title: Strange Problem
item.dc:creator: @ggallin ggallin
item.description:
@ggallin wrote:

try taking out the 30 at the end of -Xmx512m Gui 30

Read full topic

item.title: Strange Problem
item.dc:creator: @i_want_fire i want fire
item.description:
@i_want_fire wrote:

This is whats in run “@echo off
title Project Insanity
java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
start Run-Server.bat
exit”

and this is the client run “@echo off
Title Client
START java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit”

Read full topic

item.title: Strange Problem
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

[quote=“ggallin, post:4, topic:454883”][quote author=i want fire link=topic=557748.msg4081148#msg4081148 date=1345395920]
You made it 200x worse. 200 run sources came up and it was still going it almost froze my computer…
[/quote]
by replacing it with pause? i don’t think so, i guarantee you downloaded a batch virus.[/quote]

yea because it will tell him the error! like java is not recognized as an internal or external blah blah… if he leaves it at exit it wont show anything u fool, no he didn’t

Read full topic

item.title: Strange Problem
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

you need to change the path to your java in the run.bat and instead of it saying exit replace it with pause

item.title: Strange Problem
item.dc:creator: @i_want_fire i want fire
item.description:
@i_want_fire wrote:

Alright well each time I try to download an eclipse rsps server+client it acts all werid. This all started happening when I un-installed my jre7 because it wouldnt allow me to play other peoples server so now i have jre6 and jdk7. For some reason each time i run the client for any eclipse server and client the server starts flashing and moving around my computer screen and i have to open task manager to close it. And then the client does the same but only shows up 3 times and disapears. So I was thinking if i un-installed jdk7 and got jdk6 will it let me play it then? Because before i had jdk7 and jre7 and it worked fine. Thanks to anyone who can help!
